title: Prospective Randomized Trial Evaluating the Effects of Paravertebral Nerve Blocks on Postoperative Pain and the Perioperative Inflammatory Response Following Video Assisted Thorascopic Surgery

operands.value: Age greater than 18
Planned thoracoscopy with low probability(by surgeon estimate) of conversion to open procedure
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Age less than 18
Clinical or laboratory evidence of systemic infection
Current pregnancy as assessed by preoperative urine HCG test
Serious, uncontrolled, non-malignant illness
Malignant illness requiring systemic chemotherapy in the last 6 months
Documented allergy to oxycodone, morphine sulfate or acetaminophen
Patient refusal
Active infection at site of planned block
Documented allergy to any local or general anesthetic medications
Significant coagulopathy (prothrombin time > 15 seconds, INR > 1.5)
Pre-existing neuropathy and medical conditions or deformities which would compromise block or anesthetic safety
Planned pleurodesis
Current use of high dose inhaled or systemic steroids
Current use of Amiodarone (Cordarone)
Morbid obesity (BMI=40kg/m2)
Patients with clinically significant mental health issues such as psychosis requiring treatment with antipsychotic medications.
Patients unable to consent
Patients with active infections requiring antibiotics within one month of registration
Participation in other clinical trials that may interfere with this study

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Age greater than 18'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Planned thoracoscopy with low probability(by surgeon estimate) of conversion to open procedure'), Not(Or(Symbol('Active infection at site of planned block'), Symbol('Age less than 18'), Symbol('Clinical or laboratory evidence of systemic infection'), Symbol('Current pregnancy as assessed by preoperative urine HCG test'), Symbol('Current use of Amiodarone (Cordarone)'), Symbol('Current use of high dose inhaled or systemic steroids'), Symbol('Documented allergy to any local or general anesthetic medications'), Symbol('Documented allergy to oxycodone, morphine sulfate or acetaminophen'), Symbol('Malignant illness requiring systemic chemotherapy in the last 6 months'), Symbol('Morbid obesity (BMI=40kg/m2)'), Symbol('Participation in other clinical trials that may interfere with this study'), Symbol('Patient refusal'), Symbol('Patients unable to consent'), Symbol('Patients with active infections requiring antibiotics within one month of registration'), Symbol('Patients with clinically significant mental health issues such as psychosis requiring treatment with antipsychotic medications.'), Symbol('Planned pleurodesis'), Symbol('Pre-existing neuropathy and medical conditions or deformities which would compromise block or anesthetic safety'), Symbol('Serious, uncontrolled, non-malignant illness'), Symbol('Significant coagulopathy (prothrombin time > 15 seconds, INR > 1.5)'))))
